sentences.en: an old woman struggling to walk on misshapen feet
sentences.cn: 一位双脚畸形、步履艰难的老妇

sentences.en: And what were the people around him but so many blurred, misshapen figures?
sentences.cn: 在他周围的,不是变形了的轮廓模糊的人物 么 ?

sentences.en: Buddha said : each heart is lonely and misshapen when they are born.
sentences.cn: 佛曰∶每一颗心生来就是孤单而残缺的.

sentences.en: But Frumtje was repulsed by his misshapen appearance.
sentences.cn: 但因为外表丑陋,摩西遭到了她的拒绝.

sentences.en: He spoke with solemnity and his colossal misshapen nose made what he said very quaint.
sentences.cn: 他一本正经地说清,他那丑陋的大鼻子使他说的话显得非常古怪.

sentences.en: He still took out the Jacka's letter, misshapen from pockets and soggy with sweat.
sentences.cn: 他又从口袋里掏出这封皱巴巴的, 汗水浸湿的信.

sentences.en: Her hands were misshapen by arthritis.
sentences.cn: 她的双手因为关节炎而扭曲变形了。

sentences.en: His knee is misshapen and unable to move.
sentences.cn: 他的膝盖有点畸形,不能动.

sentences.en: His knee is misshapen or unable to move.
sentences.cn: 他的膝盖有点畸形,也不能动.

sentences.en: Let's recover the misshapen metal experiential ability for now on!
sentences.cn: 让我们从此刻做起,修复残缺的心理体验能力吧!

sentences.en: Many people spend their life with this kind of misshapen.
sentences.cn: 多数带着这种残缺度过一生.

sentences.en: The images you see are blurred and misshapen.
sentences.cn: 你所看到的影像又变形又模糊.

sentences.en: They are often misshapen or exaggerated in shape or expression.
sentences.cn: 他们往往是被夸大了畸形或形状或表达.

sentences.en: This misshapen ogrelike brute has taut flesh with a claylike texture.
sentences.cn: 这只畸形的食人魔状怪物有着粘土般构成的紧崩肉体.

sentences.en: Unattractive , deformed , or distorted in shape; misshapen.
sentences.cn: 由于扭曲或折叠而形成的 扭 歪的形状.

sentences.en: Without Vitamin D, bones can become thin, brittle, soft, or misshapen.
sentences.cn: 如果缺乏维生素D, 骨头就会变细 、 变脆 、 变软或者畸形.

trans.tran_en: not the normal or natural shape

trans.tran_cn: 歪曲( misshape的过去式和过去分词 )
